item.title: Bin by bus shelter overflowing with waste, 26th February
item.description:
This area is terrible for litter and it's no surprise as the bins are overflowing, particular the ones by the bus shelter, can these bins be emptied more regularly, this is the same for most bins in the area and this would help with the littering problem, thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 215, Hucclecote Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Street light has been out for some time now opposite the junction with Tamar Road along with all the street lights on Tamar road., 26th February
